numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that the percentage of NFL coaches of color is 13%.
2. I noticed that the percentage of MLB coaches of color is 20%.
3. I noticed that the percentage of MLS coaches of color is 41%.
4. I wonder why the percentage of NFL coaches of color is so low.
5. I wonder why the percentage of MLB players of color is 40%.
6. I wonder why the percentage of WNBA players of color is so high.
